titleInfo.title: Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center

name.namePart: Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center (Denver, Colo.)

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#586 Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center Guldman and Dupler Bldgs.''. On back of photograph: ''#586 Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center Guldman and Dupler Bldgs''.

mods.abstract: Exterior view of Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center in Denver, Colorado. Beth Israel was founded in 1905 and was located on the west side of Denver at 16th Avenue and Lowell Boulevard. Pictured are the Guldman and Dupler Buildings.
mods.note: Donated by Beth Israel Hospital and Geriatric Center.
